title: 1995 Brite 16’ Equipment Trailer
item_description:
1995 Brite 16’ Equipment Trailer

Dimensions

  • VIN: 189F16207S1031984
  • License per DMV (not included): 1EZ4765
    • Expiration Date: 2/28/2027
    • Note: License plate on trailer goes on Lot 114 and will be removed. 
    • Note: **on preview day 5/19/2025 the license plate was removed to the correct trailer. 
  • Overall Length: 247”
  • Overall Width: 98”
  • Deck Length: 16’
  • Deck Width: 77”
  • Side Height: 15.5”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Electric
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: 6.70-15 (front) 7.00-15 (rear)
  • Electric Plug Type: None
  • Hitch: 2" Ball

Note: Certificate of Title, and Transfer Form will be mailed 1 week following the last day of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, registration, sales tax, applying for new plates, and fees due to DMV.
